awards.title: Winner Eaumega Innovation Challenge
awards.description:
Won the Eaumega Innovation Challenge hosted by Eaumega Youth Steering Committee, UNESCO and Xylem. Our solution was a crowdsourcing mobile app prototype called Aqua: Our water, our concern; that enables democratic participation in water management practices for Mexico City, Mexico.

Link to the prototype: https://www.figma.com/proto/Lb0DQBBHDQBlTPKYzQyKGi/EAU-mexico?node-id=16%3A117&scaling=scale-down&page-id=0%3A1&starting-point-node-id=16%3A117
